original_text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.
korean_text: 그가 시험을 받아 고난을 당하셨은즉 시험 받는 자들을 능히 도우실 수 있느니라

sentences.original_text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 직접 시험을 받으며 고난을 겪으셨기 때문에

sentences.original_text: he is able to succour them
